definition.name: Go Dependency Submission
definition.description: Calculates dependencies for a Go build-target and submits the list to the Dependency Submission API
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT). Defaults to PAT provided by Action runner

inputs.name: metadata
inputs.description: User provided map of max key/value pairs of metadata to include with the snapshot e.g. {"lastModified": "12-31-2022"}

inputs.name: go-mod-path
inputs.description: Repo path to the go.mod file used to detect dependencies for the Go build target. Defaults to go.mod in the root of the repository.

inputs.name: go-build-target
inputs.description: Build target to detect build dependencies. If unspecified, will use "all", with will detect all dependencies used in all build targets (including tests and tools).

inputs.name: snapshot-sha
inputs.description: The SHA that the results will be linked to in the dependency snapshot

inputs.name: snapshot-ref
inputs.description: The ref that the results will be linked to in the dependency snapshot

inputs.name: detector-name
inputs.description: The name of the detector that generated the dependency snapshot

inputs.name: detector-version
inputs.description: The version of the detector that generated the dependency snapshot

inputs.name: detector-url
inputs.description: The URL to the detector that generated the dependency snapshot
